Other Information.Test Conditions: room temperature, atmospheric pressure, downstream pressure of ~5 Torr
Other Information.Additional Info: Ethanol was not detected in the permeate over multiple cycles.

Other Information.Test Conditions: room temperature, atmospheric pressure, downstream pressure of ~5 Torr
Other Information.Additional Info: Ethanol was not detected in the permeate over multiple cycles.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Flux: 205 ± 11 g/m² h for submicron SIM-1 membranes, Flux: 460 ± 14 g/m² h for nano SIM-1 membranes

Other Information.Additional Info: PSM with EDA vapor was required to form a free-standing membrane and prevent crystal aggregation. The SIM-1 wafer without PSM fell apart after one separation cycle.
